name: Tank Battle: Normandy
description: Land your troops on the beaches of northern France, lay bridges to cross flooded enemy defences, avoid tanktraps, clear the area of dangerous minefields, overcome the enemy and claim the beachhead for the Allies!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM
recommended_requirements: Graphics: Discrete graphics with 256 MB or more VRAM
